name: E-commerce Platform
description: Full-stack store with catalog, payments, and fulfilment.
meeting_notes: Build an e-commerce platform with catalog, cart, checkout, payment integration, and order management. Include admin dashboard and inventory tracking.

name: SaaS Analytics Dashboard
description: Multi-tenant analytics SaaS with role-based access.
meeting_notes: Design a SaaS analytics dashboard for B2B customers with tenant isolation, role-based access, scheduled reports, and alerting workflows.

name: Mobile Banking App
description: Secure banking app with KYC and transaction monitoring.
meeting_notes: Create a mobile banking platform with onboarding/KYC, account management, transfers, card controls, notifications, and fraud monitoring.
